mapper.select: SELECT KC.KEY_WORD, SC.SR_SUB_TYPE, DM.SUB_CNT FROM DM_SR_SUB_CNT DM, SR_SUB_TYPE_CODE SC, DS_KEYW_CODE KC WHERE DM.SUB_TYPE = SC.SR_SUB_TYPE_CD AND DM.MAIN_TYPE = SC.DS_KEYW_CD AND DM.MAIN_TYPE = KC.KEYW_CD
SELECT TC.TOUR_DS_NM, KC.KEY_WORD, DM.VSTR_TOTAL FROM DM_TS_TD_VSTR_SL DM, TS_TD_CODE TC, DS_KEYW_CODE KC WHERE DM.TOUR_DS_CD = TC.TOUR_DS_CD AND DM.KEYW_CD = KC.KEYW_CD
SELECT DM.AGE, TC.TOUR_DS_NM, DM.VSTR_TOTAL FROM DM_TS_AGE_TD_VSTR DM, TS_TD_CODE TC WHERE DM.TOUR_DS_CD = TC.TOUR_DS_CD
